mapper.select:
select b.* from BI_CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER_TRANS b
and b.classificationfeatureitem = #CLASSIFICATIONFEATUREITEM#
and b.fieldname = #FIELDNAME#
and b.consengvalues=#CONSENGVALUES#
and b.consengvalues is null
mapper.update:
update BI_CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER_TRANS set transnumber = transnumber+1, updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID# where
and classificationfeatureitem = #CLASSIFICATIONFEATUREITEM#
and fieldname = #FIELDNAME#
and consengvalues=#CONSENGVALUES#
and consengvalues is null

update BI_CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER_TRANS set transnumber = #TRANSNUMBER#, updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID# where
classificationfeatureitem = #CLASSIFICATIONFEATUREITEM#
and fieldname = #FIELDNAME#
and consengvalues=#CONSENGVALUES#
and consengvalues is null
mapper.insert:
insert into BI_CLASSIFICATION_NUMBER_TRANS (guid, classificationfeatureitem, consengvalues, transnumber, fieldname,
createuserguid, createtime, updateuserguid, updatetime) values (#GUID#, #CLASSIFICATIONFEATUREITEM:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CONSENGVALUES:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TRANSNUMBER#, #FIELDNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
